name: RPG 404
description:
Jump: SPACE, ENTER, MOUSE LEFT 

Welcome to RPG404, a new and exciting NFT game from indie game studio Rug Pull Games. 

Explore the world of RPG404 and collect unique, one-of-a-kind NFTs that can be used to enhance your gameplay experience. With our FREE minting feature, you can easily obtain these "worthless" NFTs and use them as your character in the game. 

To get started, visit our website at rpg404.com and mint your first NFT today. 

Share your accomplishments with your friends and followers on Twitter!

  • Website: rpg404.com
  • Twitter: rug_pull_games
  • Our Team: rug-pull.games
  • Game Engine: Godot Engine
  • Pixel Character: StrxngersNFT

btw, we really will rug in the future. HA HA HA.
